Name: Honey Berry Sour
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: More sweet than sour but berry nice.
History: Created by Tim Hallilaj, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Honey Berry Sour contains 200 calories
